# logger

Node.js logging module created for MazeMasterJS

## Change Log

### v1.0.10

-   Added check for validity of fs and fs.readFileSync to get PackageInfo() to avoid issue in web-ui / webpack (cannot access files via browser)

### v1.0.9

-   Added check for validity of fs and fs.readFileSync to get PackageInfo() to avoid issue in web-ui / webpack (cannot access files via browser)
